content.question: Which of the following best describes the value of  total  as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: It contains the sum of elements in even-numbered rows.
It contains the sum of elements in odd-numbered rows.
It contains the sum of elements in even-numbered columns.
It contains the sum of elements in odd-numbered columns.

content.answer: It contains the sum of elements in odd-numbered rows.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
